abstract: Pressure continues to mount on European banks as the credit rating agency cut the grades on Santander, BBVA and other institutions.

keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Pressure continues to mount on European banks as the credit rating agency Moody's downgraded several of Spain's largest financial institutions.
